documentation.text:
MilestoneEscrow
 - Holds all contributions for a campaign in escrow
 - Funds are released milestone-by-milestone
 - Voting is recorded off-chain (backend) and a privileged account (admin) executes releases
 - Supports refunds for unspent funds if campaign is cancelled

documentation.text:
NexaFundWeighted
 - Escrows all contributions for a single campaign
 - Milestone release gated by stake‑weighted voting with quorum and threshold
 - Admin (platform) can open/close voting windows, override release, cancel, and refund
 - Safer payout using call, events for off-chain indexing, revert on accidental ether
